headline: Simon Malls Copresident Reveals Why Foot Traffic Is Increasing
summary: Eric Sadi, copresident of Simon's mall properties, details how the company's shopping centers have increased their power to draw shoppers.

headline: Global Real Estate Sustainability Benchmark Scores For REITs Stay Stable In 2024
summary: 2024 Global Real Estate Sustainability Benchmark scores were stable for the majority of US equity real estate investment trusts scored by GRESB BV. Read more here.
